IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.swap_guild_rank') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.swap_guild_rank GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.swap_guild_rank @guild_id dbo.id_t, @rank_id1 TINYINT, @rank_id2 TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
-- TODO: transaction
UPDATE dbo.Guild_Ranks SET rank_id = 100 WHERE guild_id = @guild_id AND rank_id = @rank_id1 IF @@ROWCOUNT =1 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.Guild_Ranks SET rank_id = @rank_id1 WHERE guild_id = @guild_id AND rank_id = @rank_id2 UPDATE dbo.Guild_Ranks SET rank_id = @rank_id2 WHERE guild_id = @guild_id AND rank_id = 100 END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
